HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 5,65 EUR. Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznad 99,00 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1-5 radnih dana. U blagdanskom periodu rok isporuke se produžuje do 10 radnih dana.

weekend_delivery.days: Dostava se vrši od ponedjeljka do petka.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Rok isporuke ne odnosi se na otoke i manja mjesta. Ako adresa dostave nije obuhvaćena dostavnom mrežom GLS-a, narudžba će biti preusmjerena na Hrvatsku Poštu i plaćanje pouzećem nije moguće.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Ukupna cijena dostave s plaćanjem pouzećem je 6,65 EUR.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Postoji mogućnost posebnog izračuna naplate za teže pakete o čemu će kupac biti obaviješten prije slanja istog.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Rok isporuke ne odnosi se na otoke i manja mjesta.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 2,65 EUR. Samo za pakete do dimenzije 50x50x50 cm.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.island_surcharge: Rok isporuke ne odnosi se na otoke i manja mjesta.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, GLS Parcel Lockers, and in-store pickup in Zagreb are available. 
PROVIDERS: The primary courier is GLS. Hrvatska Pošta is used as a secondary option for areas not covered by GLS. 
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 5,65 EUR and is free for orders over 99 EUR. Cash on delivery (COD) costs 6,65 EUR. Delivery to a GLS Parcel Locker is 2,65 EUR. 
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to islands and remote locations may experience delays and might be handled by Hrvatska Pošta, where COD is not available. Parcel locker shipments are limited to a maximum size of 50x50x50 cm. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold is 99 EUR. In-store pickup is available at their Zagreb location. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly presented within the General Terms and Conditions page, featuring a helpful pricing table. However, it lacks specific details on island surcharges (providing only a general warning about delays) and express or weekend delivery options. Information on bulky item shipping is vague, stating that costs are calculated individually.
